content.rendered:
Mr. Do Nguyen Thanh Nhan has been legally appointed to the position of Operations Director with effect from July 31, 2022. He is an excellent worker who has given Newtecons a significant number of positive contributions over the years. Newtecons people believe that Mr. Nhan and his fellow Board of Management members will lead the team, enhance the apparatus needed to carry out the established strategy, and advance Newtecons.

Before joining Newtecons as Director of Economic Division in November 2020, Mr. Do Nguyen Thanh Nhan held important positions in several the top significant construction firms in Vietnam. Through confidence, a reasonable system for organizing work, a comprehension of the departmental structure, and the capacity to negotiate and make judgments at appropriate times, Mr. Nhan has gained the trust from Board of Directors and coworkers.

In the prepared session, Mr. Nhan appeared before the Evaluation Council to defend his position, and the Board of Management and all levels of management gave him favorable comments. Newtecons’ Board of Management expects that Mr. Do Nguyen Thanh Nhan will promote his capacity in both expertise and experience.

Mr. Do Nguyen Thanh Nhan is wished success in his new position and looks forward to contributing to the development of Newtecons in accordance with the established plan for 2022 and subsequent years.
